titleStmt.title: A new Scotch ballad of Jealous Nanny: or, False-hearted Willy turn'd true: to the tune of, Moggies iealousie.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby in West-Smithfield.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "My own dear Nanny, my fair eyne ..."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Item at A5:2[169] imperfect: cropped, with loss of imprint.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
